title: The shyppe of fooles
author: Brant, Sebastian, 1458-1521.
publicationStmtDate: the yere of our lorde. M.CCCCC.ix. [1509] the fyrste yere of the reygne of our souerayne lorde kynge Henry the viii. The. vi. daye of Iulii]
publicationStmtPublisher: In Flete strete by Wynky[n] de worde prynter vnto the excellent pryncesse Margarete, Countesse of Rychemonde and Derbye, and grandame vnto our moost naturall souereyne lorde kynge Henry ye. viii.,
